<span data-ttu-id="f7597-103">Velg tre prikker for å se overskriftene og andre detaljer i en e-post,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7597-103">To see the headers and other details in an email, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="f7597-104">i øvre hjørne i leseruten og velg **Vis meldingskilde**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f7597-104">at the top corner of the reading pane and select **View message source**.</span></span>
